name: Flappy Smileys
description:
Christmas Offer - FREE DOWNLOAD !!!

Flappy Smiley is one of the best episode from the "Flappy Games" series.

Flying the smiley faces and start the adventures to collect as many flowers as possible. The smiley doesn't have balance, but there are some obstacles and you should help it. Help the smiley by tapping it to fly, dodging the cylinder walls, and collect as much flowers and gain the points


Features :
•iPhone 5 Supported
•4 different smiley faces (flying carpet,santa smiley, halloween smiley) flying styles which appear intermittently during the game session
•Full UIView Elements Used
•Simple Tile Map system used
•Different backgrounds
•Send Score on Twitter & other social medial
•Explosion Particle System Used ( Used in Game Over )
